author: Simon Difford
description: Originally made for Zacapa rum which suits lemon rather than lime in a Daiquiri. Daiquiris benefit from dilution and here a dash of apple juice adds a barely perceptible amount of fruit as well.
name: Zac's Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
